lightbox/showLightBox.description: Whether to show lightbox or not at the beginning

lightbox/startAt.description: Index of the image that you want to start at

lightbox/showThumbs.description: Whether to show thumbnails or not

lightbox/autoPlayTime.description: Time to stop at an image before move on to next image

lightbox/siteLoading.description: default image when your image is error or loading

lightbox/showCaption.description: Whether to show caption or not

lightbox/disableScroll.description: set to `true` to avoid scrolling views behind lightbox

lightbox/lengthToLoadMore.description: Minimum length unto end to emit load more event

lightbox/previousText.description: Text for the previous image button

lightbox/nextText.description: Text for the next image button

lightbox/previousThumbText.description: Text for the previous thumb image button

lightbox/nextThumbText.description: Text for the next thumb image button
